template.longDescription: For a particular Anopheles gambiae gene, show it's expression according to the data of Koutsos et al at a particular developmental stage and filter this data on the mean signal ratio. This template allows you to query on the general stage: use CONTAINS embryo; larva; pupa; adult female; adult male; or adult. The templates Gene [A. gambiae] -> Life cycle expression data (filter on specific stage (and ratio)) allow you to filter on more specific stages. Note that the reference sample in this experiment is pooled RNA produced in vitro from ESTs that were used as substrates to produce amplicons for the spotted microarrays.

template.name: TimeCourseDataGeneralStageRatio_genes
template.title: Microarray Time course data from Arbeitman et al. (filter on general stage and ratio) --> Genes [D. melanogaster]
template.longDescription: Show gene expression data for a particular developmental stage according to the Arbeitman et al data set and filter this data on the median signal ratio. This template allows you to query on the general stage: use LIKE *Embryo*; *Larvae*; *Metamorphosis*; *Adult female* or *Adult male*. The templates Microarray Time course data from Arbeitman et al (filter on specific stage (and ratio)) --> Genes [D. melanogaster], allow you to filter on more specific stages. Note that the reference sample in this experiment is pooled mRNA representing all stages of the life cycle.

template.name: TFBindingSite_GeneFactor
template.title: TF binding site [D. melanogaster] --> Gene + transcription factor.

template.name: TiffinBSmotif_locations
template.title: Tiffin binding site motif --> Chromosomal locations.

constraint.description: Show the chromosomal locations of the binding sites with motif:

template.name: TilingPathSpan_GeneLocation
template.title: Tiling path span --> Genes + chromosomal location of the genes.
template.longDescription: For a particular Drosophila tiling path span, search for any overlapping genes. Show chromosome coordinates of the genes.

template.name: Tissue_Flyatlas
template.title: Tissue [D. melanogaster] --> FlyAtlas data.
